page.text: de Vence MAGAZINE GUIDE TO VENCE Souvenirs QUICKGUIDE

Introduction No matter what type of gift or Provençale souvenir you would like to buy, you will find it in a shop here. But do not ignore the many other small boutiques selling everything from antiques, through to high fashion clothing. This link icon will take you to individual websites for each establishment. To download the newest version of our Magazine click on this icon. Souvenirs Click here to return to Vence Magazine QUICKGUIDE

A large choice of article for indoor and outdoor home decor: tablecloths, handmade ceramics, fragrances. Local food products also available. 8, Place du Peyra - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 06 17 E-Mail: poteriedupeyra1@orange.fr La Poterie du Peyra Adresse 13 Place du Peyra 06140 Vence, France 9h30-19h00

09h30-12h00/14h00-19h00. Monday closed. Facettes & Cabochons Adresse 13 Place du Peyra 06140 Vence, France 79 avenue des Poilus - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 27 83 E-Mail: facettes_cabochons@orange.fr

Terre en Provence Adresse 2 Rue du Peyra 06140 Vence, France Whether buying gifts for friends, or for your own pleasure, discover our Provençal products: lavender, herbs, essential oils, soaps, perfumes. Discover beautiful olive wood and local pottery objects for home decoration or practical kitchen use. 2, rue Place Vielle- 06140 Vence Téléphone: 0493585794 9h30-12h00/14h30-19h00.

10h00-19h00/ 14h30-19h00. Saturday closed. Aura Beryl Adresse 1 Rue du Peyra 06140 Vence, France Specialist in minerals for 15 years, Aura Beryl is happy to welcome and advise you in a friendly atmosphere. We collaborate with USA companies to offer you exceptional Amerindian products. 1, place Georges Clemenceau - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 36 40 E-Mail: auraberyl@free.fr

Enjoy the pleasure of finding gift ideas at all prices: Murano glass, interior decoration objects, a large choice of jewellery. Everything in this shop is original, authentic and refined. 1, rue du Marche - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 24 36 85 E-Mail: devenceavenise@bbox.fr 10h00-12h30/15h00-19h00. Saturday closed. De Vence à Venise

09h30-13h00/ 14h30-19h00. Monday and Sunday afternoon closed. Vannerie Saveurs Provencales Adresse 8 Rue du Marché 06140 Vence, France Baskets, bags, chests... Various olive tapenades, syrups, jams, Provencal oils and vinegars. 5, rue du Marche - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 90 54 E-Mail: brmireille@wanadoo.fr

Original gift ideas at all prices. Les Yeux Rouges is also a trademark for custom made and general stickers as well as a Visual Communication Agency for all your media needs. 134, ave Emile Hugues - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 09 81 79 98 11 E-Mail: bocaldimages@lesyeuxrouges.com 10h00-12h30/14h30-19h00. Saturday and Sunday closed. Les Yeux Rouges Adresse 134 Avenue Emile Hugues 06140 Vence, France
09h30-13h00/ 14h30-19h00. Saturday and Sunday closed. Le Chat de Peyrinne Adresse 13 Place du Peyra 06140 Vence, France 6, place du Peyra - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 32 74 99
09h30-13h00/ 14h30-19h00. Saturday and Sunday closed. 134 ave Emile Hugues - 06140 Vence Téléphone: Wood Old Adresse 134 Avenue Emile Hugues 06140 Vence, France
Aux 4 Coins du Monde 6, ave Marcelin Maurel- 06140 Vence Téléphone: 9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. Adresse 10 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France

All about the icons Shopping No matter what type of gift or Provençale souvenir you would like to buy, you will find it in a shop here. Hotels and Other Accomodation If you are searching for superior comfort or a budget “bed and breakfast” you will find an accomodation to suit you here. Restaurants FASHION HOTELS SOUVENIRS DELICATESSEN GUEST HOUSES CAMPING Vence’s restaurants cater for every taste and pocket - from inexpensive “plat du jour” of local produce to exotic flavours from other lands or gourmet adventures. Cafes Vence’s many cafes are ideal places to relax and watch the world go by, to meet and chat to residents or other tourists, or plan your next excursion. Real Estate Agents See how real people live on the Côte d’Azur by visiting sales properties with a choice of Real Estate Agents. Perhaps your visit will prove a good financial investment. Services Banks, pharmacies, and if you can’t find what you’re looking for, it is probably listed here. Galleries SERVICES FINANCE TAKE-AWAY The “City of Arts” is home to many galleries. Each has its own theme, special artist or style of work. Some are hidden in interesting untravelled corners of the city. Beauty Whether tempted to try a new look or merely smartening up for a special evening out, Vence’s beauty parlours and hairdressers are at your service. Places Museums, Parks, Miscellaneous sites worth seeing...
